document.full_text: two bombs exploded in a crowded central area of the iraqi city of falluja on monday, killing at least six people and wounding 10 others, an interior ministry source said.
document.title: up to six killed in bomb blasts in iraq's falluja
lines_and_colors: two bombs exploded in a crowded central area of the iraqi city of falluja on monday, killing at least six people and wounding 10 others, an interior ministry source said.
